overview: Joanna Angel has a very unique way of teaching her Sex Ed class...she ACTUALLY educates the students on how to have better sex! Fortunately, Principal Danny Mountain is blind to her ways, and thinks she is teaching intense lessons about the human reproductive system. But after he learns how to use the Internet, he unveils the slutty truth: that Joanna Angel is a dirty whore, and not a real teacher! Can Ms. Angel continue to teach the students about DPs, anal sex and eating pussy, or will she be forced to leave the school? Find out in this dirty and hilarious comedy.
title: Hot for Teacher
